mapper.select: select count(*) from t_bed b,t_oldpeople o,t_storey s,t_room r,t_person p,t_dorm d where b.old_id=o.old_id and b.storey_id=s.storey_id and b.room_id=r.room_id and b.person_id=p.person_id and b.dorm_id=d.dorm_id

select b.*,o.old_name oldName,s.storey_name storeyName, r.room_name roomName ,p.person_name personName,d.dorm_name dormName from t_bed b,t_oldpeople o,t_storey s,t_room r,t_person p,t_dorm d where b.old_id=o.old_id and b.storey_id=s.storey_id and b.room_id=r.room_id and b.person_id=p.person_id and b.dorm_id=d.dorm_id limit #{key_off},#{pageSize}
